ComicInfo.Title: Invasion of the Triceratons, Part 4
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 11:16:23. [Issue ID 1827471]
ComicInfo.Characters: Commander Zom,Donatello,Michelangelo,Slash,April O'Neil,John Bishop,Beth O'Neil,Baxter Stockman,Raphael,Jennika,Leonardo,John O'Neil,Splinter
ComicInfo.Writer: Kevin Eastman,Bobby Curnow,Tom Waltz,Kevin Eastman,Bobby Curnow,Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.Summary:
“Invasion of the Triceratons,” Part 4 of 5. The war between the Earth Protection Force and the Triceratons reaches a fever pitch as the TMNT plead with Splinter to spare an uneasy ally’s life!
